justTypeNumber: Attention, only data points of type number can be selected
infoToCustomConfiglabel: do configuration in custom-config of a state
filtertimeTooltip: insert the filtertime wich filters the state
negativeSeparateTooltip: with enable this field, you can insert a separate filtertime for values, wich are smaller then the actual filtervalue.
negativeFiltertimeTooltip: insert the filtertime for values wich are smaller than the actual filter value
refreshRateTooltip: insert the refresh rate, wich actualize the filtered value. !!! for time synchronouse case cronJobs are used, so value with an interger multiple of 60 make sense.
refreshWithValuechangeTooltip: additional refresh if the state changes
limitMinimumTooltip: By selecting this option you can enter a value to limit the valid values ​​in the negative direction
minimumValueTooltip: Enter the smallest valid value here (all values ​​smaller than this will be limited to this)
limitMaximumTooltip: By selecting this option you can enter a value to limit the valid values ​​in the positive direction
maximumValueTooltip: Enter the biggest valid value here (all values bigger than this will be limited to this)
